author: sascharodekamp
msg: FIX: blockingTestScv Service is set to export="true" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4417) A patch from Dimitri Unruh which sets the export flag to false: blockingTestScv Service is set to export="true" without any user authorisation. So it is possible to "crash" the whole system.
